snippet: Problems with Amazon's cloud computing service over the weekend underscored how businesses and consumers are increasingly exposed to unforeseen risks as they embrace life in the cloud, Quentin Hardy reports in Monday's New York Times.
abstract: Problems with Amazon's cloud computing service over the weekend underscored how businesses and consumers are increasingly exposed to unforeseen risks as they embrace life in the cloud, Quentin Hardy reports in Monday's New York Times.

headline.main: Daily Report: Storm Makes the Cloud Look Riskier
